page.title: 11PENISTONE MARKET.
page.content: Penistone has a market on the Thursday and Saturday of each week. The market on Thursday was originaly a cattle market but now it includes all kinds of produce. As far as the selling of cattle is concerned it is in direct competition with Holmfirth market. Both Thursday and Saturday markets are well attended with many people making their weekly vist to Penistone from the outlying villages and farms. The stalls to be found include: Green produce, fish, pet food, hardware, clothes, material, haberdashery, pots and china and second hand goods.
